entry.summary: Re - 获得牌照其中一大好处是打通了香港的银行体系，令合规交易所在 OTC 方面比较有优势 - 据个人观察，目前在法规底下，香港最受关注的是稳定币与 RWA，对 DeFi 迟疑的原因是因为“旅行规则”，Uniswap 等 DEX 模式让你无法进行 KYC 与填写交易对手方信息。https://www.hkvax.com/

entry.title: Literal pvp… can’t get more degen than this
entry.summary:
Literal pvp… can’t get more degen than this
McKenna: There's an on-chain game of russian roulette where people are betting $10k per round. If you lose you lose everything. 90% of your stake goes to other players and 10% is burnt/rev share. The Telegram is absolutely wild.

entry.summary: RT pashov The new Paypal USD stablecoin has an "assetProtection" role which can wipe your balance in two transactions (first `freeze`, then `wipeFrozenAddress`) In smart contract security we call this a "centralisation attack vector"

entry.title: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to ...
entry.summary: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to not be at the top hole, because gravity.
